tweets.text: I strongly oppose the gun control bills brought forward this week under the guise of background checks. Republicans identified many problems with this bill and the Democrat majority shut out almost every one of our solutions.

Canadian Shooter Going to U.S.

- Must have 🇨🇦 gun licence (PAL) + registrations.
- Must have 🇺🇸 Permit for Temporary Importation (ATF Form 6NIA)
- At border: Must declare guns, show papers, expect search.

Much paperwork. Bill C-71 requires new police permissions. Why?

#StopC71

NOW: Rep. Debbie Dingell giving a worth-watching, emotional speech about her father's mental illness, how she hid in a closet as a child and ultimately had to keep her father from killing her mother.

"He shouldn't have had a gun!", she said.

The House finally passed common sense gun reform bill today. It was an incredible moment to see Congresswoman @lucymcbath, a mother who lost her son to gun violence, witness this historic passage. @MomsDemand @AMarch4OurLives #EndGunViolence https://t.co/09uwu6BHdz

It was a powerful moment as I voted for the first major gun safety bill in decades & saw the House gallery filled w/ advocates who have fought for this moment for years.

After Sandy Hook, Pulse, Las Vegas, daily gun violence, and especially after Parkland, finally we acted. #HR8
